message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. It holds immense value, worth $10,000 to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a discounted rate. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding.
Hello Alice, thank you for presenting your product. While it seems like a quality item, I'm working with a tighter budget. Would you consider $7,500?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, we appreciate your feedback and understanding of its value. We would like to counter your offer with a price of $8,500. This is a competitive offer that reflects the quality and worth of the product while accommodating your budget constraints. We hope this proposal will be more suitable for your needs.
Hello Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $8,000 is the highest I can go at this time.

Dear Bob, we understand your position and are willing to meet in the middle. We're proposing a final offer of $8,250 for our product. This price reflects the value we place on the product while also considering your budget constraints. We believe this is a fair compromise and hope it will enable us to reach an agreement.
